remarks: A condition for required for proof of Lemma A in [Crawley] p. 112. (Contributed by NM, 9-May-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cdlema2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlema2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlema2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlema2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlema2.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
cdlema2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlema2N $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) /\ ( ( R =/= P /\ R .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) /\ ( P .<_ X /\ -. Q .<_ X ) ) ) -> ( R ./\ X ) = .0. ) $.
